name: marcinose
cooked:
We are recruiting instructors for the Open Source Microfactory STEAM Camp here. Part of the goal is to develop a sustainable pipeline for open source product developement that leverages immersion training and incentive challenges to move open product development forward in a significant way. See full story at

https://www.opensourceecology.org/ospd-and-steam-camps/ and

steam.jpg900x590 148 KB

If you can recommend instructors, please submit your recommendation at

https://wiki.opensourceecology.org/wiki/The_Invitation
raw:
We are recruiting instructors for the Open Source Microfactory STEAM Camp here. Part of the goal is to develop a sustainable pipeline for open source product developement that leverages immersion training and incentive challenges to move open product development forward in a significant way. See full story at 

https://www.opensourceecology.org/ospd-and-steam-camps/ and![steam|690x452](upload://cNFzoe1Q42RFAaxvdR2BldhJqs7.jpg)
